description: Since Google bought Motorola and its boatload of patents last year, there's been plenty of speculation the old cellphone company would build a new product.
teaser: Since Google bought Motorola and its boatload of patents last year, there's been plenty of speculation the old cellphone company would build a new product.
contentencoded:
Google-owned Motorola is about to unveil its latest candidate on August 1: the Moto X. Since the tech giant bought Motorola and its boatload of patents last year, there's been plenty of speculation the old cellphone company would build a new product. Can it compete?

CNET's Molly Wood joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to share her thoughts. Click on the audio player above to hear the extended interview.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 23, 2013
title: Moto X: Can it compete?
